Yeah well I think as you heard us say or heard me say that we saw more six and seven figure activity than we have in a long time and certainly saw the average deal size go up on a multiple basis in Q4, and our expectation is that we'll continue, it's hard to draw trends from like a quarter or so, but we do feel like given where the pipeline is coming in and what we're seeing in the quarter and what we see projected out through the year and the types of deals we're looking at, that we feel confident that that's the type of thing we're going to be targeting throughout 2023 and beyond.
